Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.20582308]dengue 2 virus(DENV-2):inhibition of virus infection in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=8±1 μM,97% inhibition at 20μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.20582308]the peptide was found to be mildly toxic to LLC-MK2 cells at 40 µM.

Literature.Title: Structural optimization and de novo design of dengue virus entry inhibitory peptides.
Literature.Author: Costin JM, Jenwitheesuk E, Lok SM, Hunsperger E, Conrads KA, Fontaine KA, Rees CR, Rossmann MG, Isern S, Samudrala R, Michael SF.
